Package entities

Class Contestant

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • entities.Contestant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class Contestant
extends java.lang.Thread
    Contestant thread. It simulates the contestant life cycle.

        strength - contestant strength

      • incrementStrength

        public void incrementStrength()
        Increment strength. It increments the strength of the contestant by one unit. The maximum strength value is 10.

      • decrementStrength

        public void decrementStrength()
        Decrement strength. It decrements the strength of the contestant by one unit. The minimum strength value is 6.
